dependencies.description:
The azureml-core contains functionality for creating and managing: *
Azure Machine Learning workspaces, experiments and runs; * Machine
learning compute respources; * Models, images and web services.
dependencies.name: py-azureml-core

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
The Azure Machine Learning SDK for Python can be used to create ML
pipelines as well as to submit and track individual pipeline runs.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline

dependent_to.description: Represents a unit of computation in azureml-pipeline.
dependent_to.name: py-azureml-pipeline-steps

description: Core functionality to enable azureml-pipeline feature.
name: py-azureml-pipeline-core

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
